segments.text: This kitchen drawing captures a moment of domestic life.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman faces away, drying her plate intently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the running faucet has caused an overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water sheets down to the floor, wetting everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She stands in the puddle, unaware of the hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open curtains let in light from the garden outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a calm yard with plants and a path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, the boy risks it all on the wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Grabbing cookies from the jar high up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl helps by reaching up too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their cooperation in sneaking sweets is clever but naughty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: With the wet floor, a slip is inevitable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel anxious watching this unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between outside peace and inside peril is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR
